query:
ALTER TABLE sports_teams 
ADD COLUMN sport VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'motorsport',
ADD COLUMN league VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN division VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN location VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN founded INT,
ADD COLUMN stadium VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN website VARCHAR(500),
ADD COLUMN logo VARCHAR(500),
ADD COLUMN primaryColor VARCHAR(50),
ADD COLUMN secondaryColor VARCHAR(50),
ADD COLUMN description TEXT,
ADD COLUMN achievements JSON,
ADD COLUMN socialMedia JSON;
